metadata.title: CVE-2024-36957 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:octeontx2-af: avoid off-by-one read from userspaceWe try to access count + 1 byte from userspace with memdup_user(buffer,count + 1). However, the userspace only provides buffer of count bytes andonly these count bytes are verified to be okay to access. To ensure thecopied buffer is NUL terminated, we use memdup_user_nul instead.
